00037 #include "ConditionBoolDataSource.hpp"
00038 
00039 namespace RTT {
00040     using namespace detail;
00041   ConditionBoolDataSource::~ConditionBoolDataSource()
00042   {
00043       // data is shared_ptr !
00044   }
00045 
00046   bool ConditionBoolDataSource::evaluate()
00047   {
00048     return data->get();
00049   }
00050 
00051   ConditionBoolDataSource* ConditionBoolDataSource::clone() const
00052   {
00053     return new ConditionBoolDataSource( data.get() );
00054   }
00055 
00056   void ConditionBoolDataSource::reset()
00057   {
00058     data->reset();
00059   }
00060 
00061   ConditionBoolDataSource* ConditionBoolDataSource::copy( std::map<const DataSourceBase*, DataSourceBase*>& alreadyCloned ) const
00062   {
00063     return new ConditionBoolDataSource( data->copy( alreadyCloned ) );
00064   }
